p: The deep-sequence phylogenies and basic individual-level data analysed during the current study are available in the Dryad repository (DOI: 10.5061/dryad.7h46hg2). HIV-1 reads are available on reasonable request through the PANGEA consortium. Please contact project manager Lucie Abeler-DÃ¶rner ( lucie.abeler-dorner@bdi.ox.ac.uk) for further details. Additional individual-level data are available on reasonable request to RHSP. Code is available on GitHub version 1.1.2 under the GNU General Public License version 3.0.
